ygData.subject: Heritrix moved from CVS to SVN up at sourceforge
ygData.msgSnippet: The heritrix project source -- which includes the hcc and cmdline-jmxclient -- has been migrated from CVS to a subversion repository up on sourceforge.  See

Subject: Heritrix moved from CVS to SVN up at sourceforge
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281; y=qT9JvQROUcrqly3r_ZNG7w8nZ9SVoKp7t8pFCH9qzMv08-MMxWv5Vjbc
X-Yahoo-Profile: stackarchiveorg

The heritrix project source -- which includes the hcc and 
cmdline-jmxclient -- has been migrated from CVS to a subversion 
repository up on sourceforge.  See 
http://sourceforge.net/svn/?group_id=73833 for instruction on how to 
access the new location. 

Be aware that the heritrix source is now under the directory 'heritrix' 
whereas over in CVS, it used reside at ArchiveOpenCrawler.

The CVS repository remains available, so its possible to run "cvs diff" 
on existing working copies and move changes to subversion or check out 
older versions of the software from before the migration.

St.Ack
